title: Looking for players/community
body:
I recently came over like a lot of people from NA with the server move and of course now have an empty friends list. I've been searching through threads looking for people, but figured I'd also put my name out and just let people who are interested add me.

I main mid and am currently gold 5, I enjoy soloq but wouldn't mind branching into ranked 5's with a team, I also enjoy just practising and having fun in normals. I prefer voice chat if it's possible, I have access to a ts3 server if needed, also curse and skype(tho I only use Skype as a last resort)

I'm pretty casual and my schedule is a bit everywhere due to study commitments, but if you'd like please do add me, my IGN is the same as my forum name: Tirolei.

replies.body:
You can try a bunch of different places.

Zealot Gaming; Active, small community. A tad elitist. Great people.
http://www.zealotgaming.com

Oceanic LoL; Facebook based, somewhat quiet, pretty timid.
https://www.facebook.com/groups/OceanicLoL/

Oceanic Gaming; Pretty inactive, large following, worth keeping an eye on
https://www.facebook.com/OceanicGaming

There's also facebook groups for each region, depending on where you're from. It's worth looking into it.
i will add u  my game is is sdfsdfsewd
Hey man im apart of a community that has just branced out to OCE and is looking for players for a team, the websites here http://tenacitygaming.com/index.php/home/
Thank you both, I'd done a little searching and not come up with much, I'm personally in Adelaide, SA, I'll check out all of those and see if I can find some fun people to play with.
